Message: Are you there? Please tell me you're there.
Good. Listen, I'll make myself more clear.
We are a group of individuals who have all been... Disappointed in their life, in some way.
For some, it was a godsend, but for others, it was another misfortune and one more source of fear.
But we've all inquired about the future of our world and society.
Either by ourselves, or by ''Informing each other''
And... We got used to the idea that our future was going to be pretty dark.
